alert.note: Alert for Marshall; Starke (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 8:21PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Starke and northwestern Marshall Counties through 900 PM EDT/800 PM CDT/... At 821 PM EDT/721 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Hamlet, or near Knox, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Plymouth, Hamlet, Koontz Lake, La Paz, Teegarden, Donaldson, Linkville, Tyner, Grovertown and Lake Of The Woods. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
